name: The Conversion of Saul Trivia Quiz | New Testament | 10 Questions

questions.text: To what city was Saul traveling when he was blinded by a great light?
Why was Saul going to that city?
options: To meet with the High Priest
To attend the School of Gamaliel
questions.explanation:
To arrest and persecute Christians.

	Acts 9:1-2

questions.text: What did Saul say in response to Jesus' words, 'Saul, Saul, why do you persecute me'?
Why did Saul's men have to lead him into the city?
questions.correct: He was blinded by the light
options: He was hurt from falling off his horse
questions.explanation:
He was blinded by the light.

	Acts 9:7-9

questions.text: Whom did God send to heal Saul?
Saul was in the city three days before the man sent by God visited him. What does the Bible say Saul was doing during those three days?
Why was the man sent by Jesus hesitant to go see Saul?
What did the man tell Saul to do?
questions.correct: 'Arise, be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on His name.'
options: 'Ask the Lord Jesus into your heart'
questions.explanation:
'Arise, be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on His name.'

	Acts 22:16

questions.text: After Saul's conversion some people tried to kill him. How did he escape the city?
questions.correct: He was lowered in a basket through an opening in the wall
options: He disguised himself as a shepherd and snuck out the city gate
He was escorted out by an angel
Fellow believers sneaked him out through the gate as he hid in a basket
questions.explanation:
He was lowered in a basket through an opening in the wall.

	Acts 9:25

questions.text: When Saul returned to Jerusalem, the disciples were afraid of him. They did not believe that he was really a disciple. Who took Saul to meet the apostles and spoke to them on his behalf?
